ing: 1 teaspoon white sugar, or more to taste
des: "This is a quick and healthy breakfast or snack. You can easily replace the blueberries with any other fruit or berry.  I've also just used banana and added some peanut butter. Yum. You can replace the sugar with SplendaÂ®, if desired."
ins: Blend soy milk, banana, blueberries, oats, chia seeds, vanilla extract, and white sugar together in a blender until smooth.
